name: Multi-system: 16 Exchange Rates Attributes
title: 16 Exchange Rates Attributes
description: Attribute for 16 exchange rates in currencies and regions. Each CSV file is named by its currency or region (e.g., Argentina.csv, Australia.csv) and shares the same schema.

fields.name: GDP_billion_USD
fields.description: Gross Domestic Product in billion USD

fields.name: Current_Account_billion_USD
fields.description: Current account balance in billion USD

fields.name: Inflation_Rate
fields.description: Monthly inflation rate as a percentage

fields.name: Foreign_Direct_Investment_million_USD
fields.description: Foreign direct investment in million USD

fields.name: Food_Inflation
fields.description: Food inflation rate as a percentage

fields.name: Money_Supply_M1_billion_USD
fields.description: Money supply M1 in billion USD

fields.name: Money_Supply_M2_billion_USD
fields.description: Money supply M2 in billion USD

fields.name: Money_Supply_M3_billion_USD
fields.description: Money supply M3 in billion USD
